template.name: Responder
Victim
Drone
Survivor

nta.system: // System definition system Drone, Responder, Survivor, Victim;

query.formula: A<> (sum(s : id_s_t) Survivor(s).Safe + sum(v : id_v_t) Victim(v).Safe) >= ((SURVIVORS_QTY+VICTIMS_QTY)*N_perc_always_safe/100) and globalTime <= T_scs
query.comment: A percentage N_perc_always_safe of all civilians is always guaranteed to reach a safe state within T_scs

query.formula: E<> (sum(s : id_s_t) Survivor(s).Safe + sum(v : id_v_t) Victim(v).Safe) >= ((SURVIVORS_QTY+VICTIMS_QTY)*N_perc_sometimes_safe/100) and globalTime <= T_scs
query.comment: It possible, for a percentage N_perc_sometimes_safe of all civilians, to reach a safe state within T_scs

query.formula: A[] forall(i : id_s_t) not Survivor(i).Safe imply map[survivors[i].x][survivors[i].y] != FIRE and forall(i : id_v_t) not Victim(i).Safe imply map[victims[i].x][victims[i].y] != FIRE and forall(i : id_f_t) map[responders[i].x][responders[i].y] != FIRE
query.comment: Any entity is never in the fire

query.formula: A[] forall(s1 : id_s_t) forall(s2 : id_s_t) ( s1!=s2 and (not Survivor(s1).Safe) and (not Survivor(s2).Safe) ) imply survivors[s1] != survivors[s2] and forall(r1 : id_f_t) forall(r2 : id_f_t) ( r1!=r2 ) imply responders[r1] != responders[r2] and forall(s : id_s_t) forall(r : id_f_t) ( not Survivor(s).Safe ) imply survivors[s] != responders[r]
query.comment: Any entity is never in an occupied cell

query.formula: A[] (forall(i : id_s_t) !Survivor(i).Safe imply (survivors[i].x < N and survivors[i].y < M) and ((survivors[i].x < N and survivors[i].y < M) imply !Survivor(i).Safe)) and (forall(j : id_v_t) !Victim(j).Safe imply (victims[j].x < N and victims[j].y < M) and ((victims[j].x < N and victims[j].y < M) imply !Victim(j).Safe))
query.comment: Survivors and victims that are not out of the map have a valid position

query.formula: A[] (forall (i:id_d_t) Drone(i).Communicating) imply A<> (Victim(utilGetClosest(VICTIM, drones[i])).Safe and globalTime < T_v) or (Victim(utilGetClosest(VICTIM, drones[i])).Casualty and globalTime >= T_v)
query.comment: It is always guardanteed that, when a drone is in the communicating state, then eventually the victim closest to it

query.formula: A[] (globalTime <= T_scs imply forall(id : id_d_t) bounds[id].min_x >= 0 and bounds[id].max_x < N and bounds[id].min_y >= 0 and bounds[id].max_y < M and drones[id].x >= bounds[id].min_x and drones[id].x <= bounds[id].max_x and drones[id].y >= bounds[id].min_y and drones[id].y <= bounds[id].max_y)
query.comment: Bounds of the drones are valid and a drone never goes out of its bounds
